data.client_settings: Release Channel: ptb, Build Number: 30024, Version Hash: b0ad9e932379754d41bd7e876374b0b89679211c
data.actual_result: Discord crashes and needs to be reloaded
data.expected_result: Discord should change to the new language without crashing
data.short_description: Discord crashes when changing language on Gift Inventory screen, with a gift in your gift inventory
data.steps_to_repro: - Restart Discord - Have a gift in your inventory (or add one, I used Nitro Classic) - Go to User Settings > Language - Change to another language
